title: reg_tools
description: A versatile tool for manipulating and processing medical images.

add_value_or_image.title: Add Image or Value
add_value_or_image.description: This image (or value) is added to the input

sub_value_or_image.title: Subtract Image or Value
sub_value_or_image.description: This image (or value) is subtracted from the input

mul_value_or_image.title: Multiply Image or Value
mul_value_or_image.description: This image (or value) is multiplied with the input

div_value_or_image.title: Divide Image or Value
div_value_or_image.description: This image (or value) is divided by the input

smooth_value.title: Smooth with B-Spline Curve
smooth_value.description: The input image is smoothed using a B-spline curve

smooth_gaussian.title: Smooth with Gaussian Kernel
smooth_gaussian.description: The input image is smoothed using a Gaussian kernel

rms_image.title: Compute RMS
rms_image.description: Compute the mean RMS between the input image and this image

nan_mask_image.title: NaN Mask Image
nan_mask_image.description: This image is used to mask the input image. Voxels outside of the mask are set to NaN
